scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.lint:php: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm php-dev composer lint
scripts.lint:php:fix: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm php-dev composer lint-fix
scripts.test: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm php-dev composer test
scripts.test:coverage: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm php-dev composer test-coverage
scripts.security: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm php-dev composer security
scripts.docker:shell: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm php-dev bash
scripts.docker:node: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm node-dev bash

*.php: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm php-dev composer lint-fix
